mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDENT (STUDENT_CODE, TEST_CODE, USER_ID, STUDENT_DEPTM, STUDENT_NAME, STUDENT_EMAIL, TEST_FLAG) VALUES (#{student_code}, 'A033212', 'SSUIT', #{student_deptm}, #{student_name}, #{student_email}, 'N')
INSERT INTO STUDENTANSWER (TEST_NUM, STUDENT_CODE, TEST_CODE, USER_ID) VALUES (#{test_num}, #{student_code}, 'A033212', 'SSUIT')
